# Esna II, 93 {-}



- Location: Central Door, Left Side,top
- Date: Most likely Vespasian (Sauneron)
- [Hieroglyphic Text](https://www.ifao.egnet.net/uploads/publications/enligne/Temples-Esna002.pdf#page=258){target="_blank"}
- Bibliography: None

#### Nekhbet {-}
<div class="col2">

| *dỉ(.t) ʿnḫ-ḏd-wȝs nb  *
| *snb nb  *
| *ȝw.t-ỉb nb [to...]  *
| *ḥr ḫnty ʿnḫ.w [nb].w  *

She who gives all *ʿnḫ-ḏd-wȝs*
all health,
all happiness [to...]
Horus, foremost of [all] the living.

</div>
#### In Front of the King {-}
<div class="col2">

| *ḥtp-dỉ-nsw  *
| *ỉḫt nb ʿq r [...]  *
| *[...]  *
| *[ỉw=w wʿb.w]  *
|
| An offering of the king:
| all things that enter to [the temple?]
| [...]
| [they are pure.]

</div>
